tool_description:
Extract text from images using OCR and Image To Text Technology with accuracy up to 90%. Currently, we support over 100+ languages, but if you do need to extract other languages, feedback us and we will be happy to add them as well.

List of language supported is Afrikaans, Amharic, Arabic, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Belarusian, Bengali, Tibetan, Bosnian, Breton, Bulgarian, Catalan, Czech, Corsican, Welsh, Danish, German, Divehi, Dhivehi, Maldivian, Dzongkha, Greek, Modern, English, Esperanto, Es...
name: Use OCR Image To Text Technology To Extract Text From Any Image
title: Use OCR Image To Text Technology To Extract Text From Any Image
tool_name: Use OCR Image To Text Technology To Extract Text From Any Image

api_list.name: Get Text From Image
api_list.description: Enter a Base-64 Encoded Image String (required) and language choice which is a short 3 letter string (optional). Default language is English. Current max POST size is 3 MB but may be increased in the future if there is user feedback for it.
